Description: PLEASE READ BEFORE BIDDING BIDDING: IF YOU HAVE LESS THAN 10 FEEDBACKS YOU MUST EMAIL US PRIOR TO BIDDING. - If you have NO FEEDBACK or NEGATIVE FEEDBACK (Meaning your overall score is a negative) PLEASE DO NOT BID, YOUR BID WILL BE CANCELLED. We have to do this because of so many problems with new ebayers. PAYMENT: - Payment by PayPal must be received within 3 days of the end of the auction. - We do not accept personal or business checks. - Tennessee residents must pay state sales tax of 9.25%. SHIPPING: - We only ship to the continental U.S - We ship Fedex ground, NO P.O. BOXES! - We DON'T ship to Canada, so please don't ask. - We will email tracking numbers after the item ships. - We try to ship within one day from receiving payment. RETURNS: - We allow returns if something is not as described. - Returns must be made within fourteen days. - If something is damaged in shipping do not throw away any boxes or any of the packing materials. - Contact us immediately if there is a problem. CONTACT: - Jeff (615)353-9803. - We are open 10 am to 6 pm Mon – Fri central time. - 10 am to 5 pm Sat central time IF YOU HAVE LESS THAN 10 FEEDBACKS YOU MUST EMAIL US PRIOR TO BIDDING. GUILD SF-4 UP FOR AUCTION IS A GUILD STARFIRE 4 HOLLOW BODY ELECTRIC GUITAR. BASED ON THE SERIAL NUMBER, I BELIEVE IT WAS MADE IN 1983. THIS 36 YEAR OLD GUITAR REMAINS IN VERY GOOD CONDITION. THE GLOSSY BLACK FINISH STILL HAS MOST OF ITS ORIGINAL LUSTER. IT HAS GOLD TONE HARDWARE. IT HAS A STRAIGHT NECK WITH LOW, SUPER PLAYABLE ACTION. ALL OF THE PICKUPS AND ELECTRONICS WORK PROPERLY AND THE GUITAR SOUNDS GREAT. THE ACTUAL CONDITION OF THE GUITAR IS AS FOLLOWS: THERE APPEARS TO BE SOME KIND OF PAINT OVERSPRAY ON THE TOP OF THE BODY AND THE FRONT OF THE HEADSTOCK IN THE FORM OF VERY TINY WHITE FLECKS. IT JUST LOOKS LIKE A BIT OF LIGHT DUST (VISIBLE IN PICS). THERE IS SOME BUCKLE RASH ON THE BACK OF THE BODY. THERE IS VIRTUALLY NO FRET WEAR AND THE FINGER BOARD IS EXCELLENT. THERE IS SOME CHIPPED PAINT NEXT TO THE BINDING AROUND THE CUTAWAYS AT THE TOP OF THE BODY ON EITHER SIDE OF THE NECK. YOU CAN SEE THIS HAS HAPPENED IN THE SMALL AREA WHERE THE PAINT AND FINISH HAS OVERLAPPED THE BINDING BY A FEW MILIMETERS (SHOWN IN DETAIL). THERE IS A LITTLE BIT OF CHECKING STARTING TO DEVELOPE IN THAT AREA AND AROUND THE INPUT JACK. OTHER THAN THAT, THERE ARE JUST SOME TYPICAL HANDLING MARKS AND LIGHT SCRATCHES HERE AND THERE. IT WILL COME IN A NICE HARD SHELL CASE MADE BY GATOR CASES. I DON'T WANT TO SOUND LIKE I AM BEATING THE GUITAR UP. IT IS A REALLY A NICE PIECE. IT'S A REAL PLAYER WITH A NICE STRAIGHT NECK, LOW ACTION AND BEAUTIFUL TONE. WE JUST LIKE TO POINT OUT ANY FLAWS IN THE SPIRIT OF FULL DISCLOSURE. BASED OUT OF NASHVILLE TENNESSEE,WE HAVE BEEN SELLING FINE GUITARS ON EBAY FOR 20 YEARS AND OUR FEEDBACK SPEAKS FOR ITSELF. FULLY INSURED SHIPPING IS $50 INSIDE THE CONTINENTAL USA. FULLY INSURED SHIPPING WILL BE $50 ANYWHERE IN THE CONTINENTAL USA (LOWER 48). A SIGNATURE WILL BE REQUIRED UPON DELIVERY. PLEASE FEEL TO EMAIL QUESTIONS OR CALL (615) 353-9803. PLEASE CONTACT US PRIOR TO LEAVING US NEGATIVE OR NEUTRAL FEEDBACK, OR A LOW STAR RATING SO WE CAN HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO PROVIDE YOU WITH 100% SATISFACTION.
